basics.name: Víctor Granda Mancebo
basics.label: Full Stack Developer & 3D CAD/CAM specialist
basics.summary: 2 years of experience as a Fullstack web developer. Right now I'm a Freelance web Developer, a 3D modeling and printing specialist . I live in Barcelona, Spain.

work.name: Dentistraining Academy
work.summary: I leveraged my skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to design and create the clinic's website employing the SquareSpace's CMS. This allowed me to bring the envisioned design to life, a key focus during development was to create a responsive website, guaranteeing optimal user experiences across various devices and screen sizes. This ensured that international professionals could access the content seamlessly, regardless of their location or preferred device.
competencies: Web Development: Skilled in Front End development, ensuring seamless user experiences.
Knowledgeable in styling for attractive, responsive designs.

work.name: Dental Clinic Dr.Victor Granda
work.summary: I designed and developed the website for my family’s clinic, where I had free design decision making. To ensure the ease of use in the future, so anyone can modify the website, I decided that the use of a CMS was required again, but try to modify it with embedded code. This project taught me the importance of a good SEO strategy, and how to implement an ecommerce page, taking advantage of already existing components for the CMS in use.
competencies: Web Development: Skilled in Front End development, ensuring seamless user experiences.
Knowledgeable in styling for attractive, responsive designs.

work.name: ISDI Coders
work.summary: In my time at the ISDI Coders Fullstack developer bootcamp program, I gained valuable experience in a simulated professional setting, honing key skills for web development and programming.
competencies: Analytical Skills: Developed an analytical mindset for solving technical issues.
Object-Oriented Programming: Gained expertise in OOP for efficient software development.
Web Development: Skilled in both Back End and Front End development, ensuring seamless user experiences.
Web Technologies: Proficient in React.js, AngularJS, Vue.js, TypeScript, and Bootstrap for modern, responsive interfaces.
JavaScript and TypeScript: Enhanced JavaScript skills and learned TypeScript for robust application development.
Agile Methodologies: Experienced in Agile and Scrum within team settings for effective collaboration and timely project delivery.
Development Tools: Practiced with Webpack, Babel.js, Docker, Git, GitHub, Jest, and CI/CD concepts.
Database Management: Skilled in MongoDB and Mongoose for efficient data handling.
CSS, SASS & Bootstrap: Knowledgeable in styling for attractive, responsive designs.
